Construction.text002_original: Web Designer, Web Developer, Front End Developer, Apps Designer, Apps Developer

About.text002: I'm a 27 years old Brazilian Developer, husband of this incredible Woman in the pic and father of a lovely princess!
About.text003: I lives in São Paulo/BR and I'm a very homely person, usually I spend most of my time with my family and coding.
About.text004: Curious, determined and adaptable are my principal characteristics. Coding is more than a job for me, its my hobbie and because of this I'm constantly searching for new knowledges and experiencies.
About.text005: I'm constantly searching for new challenges, to be in a real situation with real problems to solve, that's how I learned to be who I am today.

Experience.text003: Development of Commercial and Personal websites using Node server and React.js builds. Acctualy i'm working in a Blog and a Landing Page
Experience.text006: Development and Maintenance of applications in the financial area written in Java using the AWB framework (Bradesco Web Architecture / JSF)

Footer.text006: Personal website with no intention to save, get or distribute anything else than my curriculum and professional data.
